Title: Classic Margherita Pizza
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup tomato sauce, 8 oz mozzarella, 1/4 cup basil, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp yeast, 1/2 cup water
Instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water to make dough. Let rise for 1 hour. Roll out dough and spread tomato sauce. Top with mozzarella and bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes. Garnish with fresh basil.
Cleaned_Ingredients: flour, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, salt, yeast, water

Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1/2 cup tofu, 2 tbsp vegetable oil
Instructions: Heat oil in wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes. Add tofu and soy sauce. Cook for 2 more minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: mixed vegetables, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, tofu, vegetable oil

Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients: 1 lb chicken, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp curry powder, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden. Add garlic and curry powder. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: chicken, onion, tomatoes, curry powder, coconut milk, garlic, oil, salt

Title: Quinoa Salad
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 2 cups water, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1/4 cup olives, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper
Instructions: Cook quinoa in water for 15 minutes. Let cool. Chop vegetables and mix with quinoa. Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Cleaned_Ingredients: quinoa, water, cucumber, tomato, olives, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper

Title: Bean Burrito
Ingredients: 1 can black beans, 4 tortillas, 1 cup rice, 1 avocado, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/2 cup cheese, 1/4 cup sour cream
Instructions: Heat beans and rice. Warm tortillas. Spread beans and rice on tortilla. Add avocado, salsa, cheese, and sour cream. Roll tightly.
Cleaned_Ingredients: black beans, tortillas, rice, avocado, salsa, cheese, sour cream

Title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
Ingredients: 1 cup almond flour, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tbsp honey, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp vanilla, butter for cooking
Instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and whisk. Heat butter in pan. Pour batter and cook until bubbles form. Flip and cook for 1 minute.
Cleaned_Ingredients: almond flour, eggs, milk, honey, baking powder, vanilla, butter

Title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 sweet potato, 1 cup chickpeas, 2 cups spinach, 1 avocado, 2 tbsp tahini, 1 lemon, salt, pepper
Instructions: Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 20 minutes. Cook quinoa. Arrange quinoa, sweet potato, chickpeas, and spinach in bowl. Top with avocado and tahini dressing.
Cleaned_Ingredients: quinoa, sweet potato, chickpeas, spinach, avocado, tahini, lemon, salt, pepper

Title: Mediterranean Salad
Ingredients: 2 cups lettuce, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1/4 cup feta, 1/4 cup olives, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, oregano
Instructions: Chop vegetables and combine in bowl. Add feta and olives. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano for dressing. Toss and serve.
Cleaned_Ingredients: lettuce, cucumber, tomato, feta, olives, olive oil, lemon juice, oregano

Title: Spaghetti Carbonara
Ingredients: 8 oz spaghetti, 4 slices bacon, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup parmesan, 2 cloves garlic, black pepper, salt
Instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon until crispy. Whisk eggs with parmesan. Combine hot pasta with bacon, then quickly mix with egg mixture. Add pepper.
Cleaned_Ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, eggs, parmesan, garlic, black pepper, salt

Title: Vegetable Soup
Ingredients: 2 carrots, 2 celery stalks, 1 onion, 4 cups vegetable broth, 1 cup potatoes, 1 cup green beans, 2 tbsp tomato paste
Instructions: Chop vegetables. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery. Add broth and remaining vegetables. Simmer for 30 minutes. Season to taste.
Cleaned_Ingredients: carrots, celery, onion, vegetable broth, potatoes, green beans, tomato paste

Title: Grilled Salmon
Ingredients: 2 salmon fillets, 1 lemon, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, dill, salt, pepper
Instructions: Marinate salmon in olive oil, garlic, and dill for 30 minutes. Grill for 4-6 minutes per side. Squeeze lemon juice before serving.
Cleaned_Ingredients: salmon, lemon, olive oil, garlic, dill, salt, pepper

Title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
Ingredients: 2 avocados, 1/4 cup cocoa powder, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1 tsp vanilla, pinch of salt
Instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Chill for 2 hours. Serve with berries or whipped cream.
Cleaned_Ingredients: avocados, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla, salt

Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients: 1 lb chicken, 8 cups chicken broth, 2 carrots, 2 celery, 1 onion, 2 cups noodles, thyme, salt, pepper
Instructions: Cook chicken in broth. Remove and shred. Add vegetables and simmer for 20 minutes. Add noodles and cook until tender. Return chicken to pot.
Cleaned_Ingredients: chicken, chicken broth, carrots, celery, onion, noodles, thyme, salt, pepper

Title: Cauliflower Rice
Ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, salt, pepper, parsley
Instructions: Grate cauliflower into rice-like pieces. Sauté onion and garlic. Add cauliflower and cook for 5-7 minutes. Season and garnish.
Cleaned_Ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, parsley

Title: Tofu Scramble
Ingredients: 14 oz tofu, 1 tbsp turmeric, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp nutritional yeast, 1 tbsp oil, salt, pepper
Instructions: Crumble tofu. Sauté vegetables. Add tofu and turmeric. Cook for 10 minutes. Add nutritional yeast and season.
Cleaned_Ingredients: tofu, turmeric, onion, bell pepper, nutritional yeast, oil, salt, pepper

Title: Beef Tacos
Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 8 taco shells, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup lettuce, 1 cup cheese, 2 tbsp taco seasoning
Instructions: Brown beef with onion and seasoning. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef and top with vegetables and cheese.
Cleaned_Ingredients: ground beef, taco shells, onion, tomatoes, lettuce, cheese, taco seasoning

Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients: 2 cups broccoli, 2 cups carrots, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, herbs, salt, pepper
Instructions: Chop vegetables and toss with oil and seasonings. Roast at 425°F for 25-30 minutes until tender and slightly crispy.
Cleaned_Ingredients: broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, onion, olive oil, garlic, herbs, salt, pepper

Title: Lentil Curry
Ingredients: 1 cup lentils, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp curry powder, 1 can coconut milk, 3 cups water, 2 cloves garlic
Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute. Add lentils, tomatoes, and water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add coconut milk.
Cleaned_Ingredients: lentils, onion, tomatoes, curry powder, coconut milk, water, garlic

Title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
Ingredients: 2 cups Greek yogurt, 1 cup granola, 1 cup mixed berries, 2 tbsp honey, mint for garnish
Instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in glasses. Drizzle with honey and garnish with mint.
Cleaned_Ingredients: greek yogurt, granola, mixed berries, honey, mint

Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients: 1 lb shrimp, 8 oz linguine, 4 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup white wine, 4 tbsp butter, 1 lemon, parsley, salt
Instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add wine and lemon juice. Toss with pasta and parsley.
Cleaned_Ingredients: shrimp, linguine, garlic, white wine, butter, lemon, parsley, salt

Title: Vegetable Lasagna
Ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles, 2 cups marinara, 2 cups ricotta, 2 cups spinach, 1 zucchini, 1 cup mozzarella, 1/4 cup parmesan
Instructions: Cook noodles. Layer noodles, sauce, ricotta, and vegetables. Repeat layers. Top with cheeses and bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: lasagna noodles, marinara, ricotta, spinach, zucchini, mozzarella, parmesan

Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients: 2 cups chicken, 1/2 cup mayo, 1/4 cup celery, 1/4 cup grapes, 2 tbsp almonds, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt, pepper
Instructions: Mix all ingredients. Chill for 1 hour. Serve on bread or lettuce leaves.
Cleaned_Ingredients: chicken, mayo, celery, grapes, almonds, lemon juice, salt, pepper

Title: Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients: 2 cups oats, 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 egg, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 cup raisins, 1 tsp baking soda
Instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add egg. Mix dry ingredients and combine. Fold in raisins. Bake at 350°F for 12-15 minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: oats, flour, butter, sugar, egg, cinnamon, raisins, baking soda

Title: Fish Tacos
Ingredients: 1 lb white fish, 8 corn tortillas, 2 cups cabbage, 1/4 cup cilantro, 1 lime, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 avocado
Instructions: Season and cook fish. Warm tortillas. Fill with fish, cabbage, and avocado. Top with cilantro-lime sauce.
Cleaned_Ingredients: white fish, corn tortillas, cabbage, cilantro, lime, sour cream, avocado

Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients: 4 bell peppers, 1 cup rice, 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 cup cheese, herbs
Instructions: Cook rice and beef mixture. Cut peppers and remove seeds. Stuff with mixture. Top with sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: bell peppers, rice, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, cheese, herbs

Title: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: 1 cup arborio rice, 4 cups broth, 2 cups mushrooms, 1 onion, 1/2 cup white wine, 1/4 cup parmesan, 3 tbsp butter
Instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onion. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes. Add wine, then broth gradually. Stir until creamy. Add butter and cheese.
Cleaned_Ingredients: arborio rice, broth, mushrooms, onion, white wine, parmesan, butter

Title: Chicken Stir Fry
Ingredients: 1 lb chicken, 3 cups vegetables, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 2 tbsp oil
Instructions: Cut chicken and stir-fry until cooked. Remove. Stir-fry vegetables. Return chicken, add sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
Cleaned_Ingredients: chicken, vegetables, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, oil

Title: Caprese Salad
Ingredients: 4 tomatoes, 8 oz mozzarella, 1/4 cup basil, 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 tbsp balsamic, salt, pepper
Instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange alternately on plate. Top with basil. Drizzle with oil and balsamic. Season.
Cleaned_Ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic, salt, pepper

Title: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables, 1 onion, 2 tbsp curry paste, 1 can coconut milk, 1 tbsp oil, 1 tbsp lime juice
Instructions: Sauté onion and curry paste. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. Add coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes. Add lime juice.
Cleaned_Ingredients: mixed vegetables, onion, curry paste, coconut milk, oil, lime juice

Title: Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: 2 bananas, 1 cup milk, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp honey, 1/2 tsp vanilla, ice cubes
Instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
Cleaned_Ingredients: bananas, milk, yogurt, honey, vanilla, ice cubes
